external_references.description: Jeff Johnson, Fred Plan, Adrian Sanchez, Renato Fontana, Jake Nicastro, Dimiter Andonov, Marius Fodoreanu, Daniel Scott. (2023, April 20). 3CX Software Supply Chain Compromise Initiated by a Prior Software Supply Chain Compromise; Suspected North Korean Actor Responsible. Retrieved August 25, 2025.

objects.description: During the [3CX Supply Chain Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0057), [AppleJeus](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1049)'s VEILEDSIGNAL communication module supports three commands to conduct the following actions: send implant data, execute shellcode, and terminate itself.(Citation: Mandiant 3cx UNC4736 2023)
